definitions.definition: A sail or either of the two sails rigged just above the course sail and supported by the topmast on a square-rigged sailing ship.
In a fore-and-aft -rigged sailing boat, the sail that is set above the gaff at the top part of the mast.

main_definition: ( nautical ) A sail or either of the two sails rigged just above the course sail and supported by the topmast on a square-rigged sailing ship.
secondary_definitions: ( nautical ) In a fore-and-aft -rigged sailing boat, the sail that is set above the gaff at the top part of the mast.
